---
title: "AntiKlexos"
---

Welcome to the homepage for **AntiKlexos**.

This page is still under construction.

But before you leave, you should know that *antiklexos* is the opposite of *klexos*.

> Klexos is a Greek word that means «fixation on the past.»
> This here is antiklexos. We represent all that is opposed to this fixation so that you
> live in a present full of adventure.

To learn more about Quarto websites visit <https://quarto.org/docs/websites>.
